meanings.definition: Accept that (something) is true or exists.
meanings.sent1: I believe the sun is hot.
meanings.sent3: The cat believes the vacuum is a monster!
meanings.sent5: They believe in ghosts at night.

meanings.definition: Have faith or confidence in (something or someone).
meanings.sent1: I believe my friend will come.
meanings.sent3: The dog believes the mailman is a friend.
meanings.sent5: They believe in each other's dreams.

meanings.definition: Feel sure that (something) is true or will happen.
meanings.sent1: I believe it will rain today.
meanings.sent2: She believes the bus will be late.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel believes the acorn will grow into a tree.
meanings.sent4: His intuition believes in the future.
meanings.sent5: They believe the stars will guide them home.
